channel.title: Getting status code - urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:status:RequestDenied
channel.description: Hello.. we upgraded from v8 to v10 and the saml integration is no longer working. We get the error: urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:status:RequestDenied. Saml was working in v8. Has anyone come across this before? We are currently using ADFS as the IDP. Thanks

item.title: Getting status code - urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:2.0:status:RequestDenied
item.dc:creator: jeffwhite06
item.description:
We are experiencing the same issue. It seems the issuer portion of the request was broken between versions. No fix from what I can tell.

Read full topic
